channel.title: Netgear and Creative announce standalone Skype phones
channel.description: Like buses, you wait for ages then two come along at once. Following a wave of Skype announcements at CES, Creative have announced a new Skype phone. Unlike previous offerings, this one does not need a computer to make Skype...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: A wifi Skype phone, how cool!!
item.dc:creator: Ben
